__TOC__

* Contact: Pierre Delcher (Shinkan) shinkan_nospam@gmail.com
* Brand: Satellite
* Make : Toshiba
* Model: A100-455
* Website: http://fr.computers.toshiba-europe.com

=== Current Issues ===
* Problem when resuming : 
** Fan is locked at high speed during a long time.
** Second (ONLY SECOND) CPU core is locked at full speed forever (you must reboot to enable freq scaling).
** Network Manager doesn't find interfaces anymore.
* Hardware Wifi Switch on "OFF" makes Ubuntu unable to boot (with kernel lock : "CPU#0 Lock ...")
* No Function Keys ...
* No Brightness Control ...
